message.content:
cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.CL, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of representing metadata in a uniform way that can be queried effectively, which is a common issue in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The method proposed in the paper uses clustering and embeddings, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.AI) and data mining (cs.DB). The paper also discusses the use of ontologies, which are relevant to knowledge representation and reasoning (cs.AI) and semantic web (cs.LG).
